text: Anil Devgan (1969 - 5 October 2020) was an Indian movie director and screenwriter. He was born in Mumbai, Maharashtra. He was known for directing Raju Chacha, Blackmail and Haal-e-Dil. He also wrote the screenplays for movies. Devgan died of cardiac arrest on 5 October 2020 in Mumbai at the age of 51.Ajay Devgn's cousin, director Anil Devgan, dies at 51 ==References== Category:1969 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Indian movie directors Category:Indian screenwriters Category:People from Mumbai Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest
title: Anil Devgan
